docs/Boose_Testing.BooseTesting.html.title: Class BooseTesting | Jays Boose Documentation
docs/Boose_Testing.BooseTesting.html.summary: Class BooseTesting Namespace Boose_Testing Assembly Boose Testing.dll Unit tests for the application canvas implementation IAPPCanvas. Verifies basic drawing operations update the internal pen position as expected. [TestClass] public sealed class BooseTesting Inheritance object BooseTesting Inherited Members object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.ToString() Methods DrawTotest() Verifies that DrawTo(int, int) draws from the current pen position to the supplied coordinates and updates the pen position to the destination coordinates. [TestMethod] public void DrawTotest() MoveTotest() Verifies that MoveTo(int, int) updates the pen position to the supplied coordinates. [TestMethod] public void MoveTotest() MultiLineTest() Executes a sequence of canvas operations (MoveTo, Circle, Rect) and asserts that the final pen position equals the last explicit MoveTo call in the sequence. This ensures drawing operations do not unexpectedly modify the pen position. [TestMethod] public void MultiLineTest()

docs/Boose_Testing.html.title: Namespace Boose_Testing | Jays Boose Documentation
docs/Boose_Testing.html.summary: Namespace Boose_Testing Classes BooseTesting Unit tests for the application canvas implementation IAPPCanvas. Verifies basic drawing operations update the internal pen position as expected.

docs/Booze_Project.AppCircle.html.title: Class AppCircle | Jays Boose Documentation
docs/Booze_Project.AppCircle.html.summary: Class AppCircle Namespace Booze_Project Assembly Booze Project.dll Represents the 'circle' command. Validates a single integer parameter and instructs the canvas to draw a circle of the specified radius. Inherits from BOOSE.CommandOneParameter. internal class AppCircle : CommandOneParameter, ICommand Inheritance object Command CanvasCommand CommandOneParameter AppCircle Implements ICommand Inherited Members CommandOneParameter.param1 CommandOneParameter.param1unprocessed CommandOneParameter.CheckParameters(string[]) CanvasCommand.yPos CanvasCommand.xPos CanvasCommand.canvas CanvasCommand.Canvas Command.IsDouble Command.program Command.parameterList Command.parameters Command.paramsint Command.Set(StoredProgram, string) Command.Compile() Command.ProcessParameters(string) Command.ToString() Command.Program Command.Name Command.ParameterList Command.Parameters Command.Paramsint object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) Constructors AppCircle() Initializes a new instance of the AppCircle class. This parameterless constructor is preserved for factory/serialization use. public AppCircle() AppCircle(Canvas, int) Initializes a new instance of the AppCircle class with the supplied canvas and radius. public AppCircle(Canvas c, int radius) Parameters c Canvas The canvas on which the circle will be drawn. radius int The radius (in pixels) of the circle. Fields radius The radius (in pixels) to use when drawing the circle. Set during Execute(). private int radius Field Value int Methods Execute() Executes the command: Ensures the provided parameter is an integer (not a double). Reads the integer radius from the inherited paramsint. Validates the radius is >= 1. Requests the canvas to draw the circle. public override void Execute() Exceptions CanvasException Thrown when the parameter is a double or when the radius is less than 1.

docs/Booze_Project.AppCommandFactory.htm.title: Class AppCommandFactory | Jays Boose Documentation
docs/Booze_Project.AppCommandFactory.htm.summary: Class AppCommandFactory Namespace Booze_Project Assembly Booze Project.dll Application-specific command factory that creates concrete BOOSE.ICommand instances for commands supported by the application and delegates unknown commands to the base BOOSE.CommandFactory. internal class AppCommandFactory : CommandFactory, ICommandFactory Inheritance object CommandFactory AppCommandFactory Implements ICommandFactory Inherited Members object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.ToString() Remarks This factory maps textual command names produced by the parser to concrete command implementations used by the application. Currently supported command names are: "circle" → AppCircle "moveto" → AppMoveTo "rect" → AppRect If the command name is not recognised here the call is forwarded to the base factory implementation. Methods MakeCommand(string) Create an BOOSE.ICommand instance for the specified command type. public override ICommand MakeCommand(string commandType) Parameters commandType string The command name produced by the parser (e.g. "moveto", "circle", "rect"). Returns ICommand An BOOSE.ICommand implementing the behaviour for commandType. If the command type is not handled by this factory the call is delegated to MakeCommand(string) Remarks The comparison is performed using the exact string values shown above.

docs/Booze_Project.AppMoveTo.html.title: Class AppMoveTo | Jays Boose Documentation
docs/Booze_Project.AppMoveTo.html.summary: Class AppMoveTo Namespace Booze_Project Assembly Booze Project.dll Application implementation of the BOOSE.CommandTwoParameters for the moveto command. Reads two integer parameters (x, y) from the inherited paramsint array and instructs the associated canvas to move the pen position to that location. internal class AppMoveTo : CommandTwoParameters, ICommand Inheritance object Command CanvasCommand CommandOneParameter CommandTwoParameters AppMoveTo Implements ICommand Inherited Members CommandTwoParameters.param2 CommandTwoParameters.param2unprocessed CommandTwoParameters.CheckParameters(string[]) CommandOneParameter.param1 CommandOneParameter.param1unprocessed CanvasCommand.yPos CanvasCommand.xPos CanvasCommand.canvas CanvasCommand.Canvas Command.IsDouble Command.program Command.parameterList Command.parameters Command.paramsint Command.Set(StoredProgram, string) Command.Compile() Command.ProcessParameters(string) Command.ToString() Command.Program Command.Name Command.ParameterList Command.Parameters Command.Paramsint object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) Remarks The command expects integer parameters. The command validates that the supplied coordinates are within the drawing bounds (0..600). If the coordinates are out of range a BOOSE.BOOSEException is thrown. Constructors AppMoveTo() Initializes a new instance of the AppMoveTo class. Parameterless constructor required by factory/serialization usage. public AppMoveTo() AppMoveTo(int, int) Initializes a new instance of the AppMoveTo class with the supplied coordinates. This constructor is provided for convenience/testing; the runtime normally sets coordinates from paramsint. public AppMoveTo(int x, int y) Parameters x int Initial X coordinate. y int Initial Y coordinate. Fields x X coordinate used by Execute(). private int x Field Value int y X coordinate used by Execute(). private int y Field Value int Methods Execute() Execute the moveto command. public override void Execute() Remarks Behaviour: Calls base.Execute() to allow base class processing. Reads integer parameters from the inherited paramsint array: x = paramsint[0] and y = paramsint[1]. Validates the coordinates are within the allowed drawing box (0..600). If validation passes, calls Canvas.MoveTo(x, y) to update the pen position. Exceptions BOOSEException Thrown when the supplied coordinates are outside the drawing bounds.

docs/Booze_Project.AppRect.html.title: Class AppRect | Jays Boose Documentation
docs/Booze_Project.AppRect.html.summary: Class AppRect Namespace Booze_Project Assembly Booze Project.dll Application implementation of the BOOSE.CommandTwoParameters for the rect command. Validates two integer parameters (width and height) and instructs the canvas to draw a rectangle. internal class AppRect : CommandTwoParameters, ICommand Inheritance object Command CanvasCommand CommandOneParameter CommandTwoParameters AppRect Implements ICommand Inherited Members CommandTwoParameters.param2 CommandTwoParameters.param2unprocessed CommandTwoParameters.CheckParameters(string[]) CommandOneParameter.param1 CommandOneParameter.param1unprocessed CanvasCommand.yPos CanvasCommand.xPos CanvasCommand.canvas CanvasCommand.Canvas Command.IsDouble Command.program Command.parameterList Command.parameters Command.paramsint Command.Set(StoredProgram, string) Command.Compile() Command.ProcessParameters(string) Command.ToString() Command.Program Command.Name Command.ParameterList Command.Parameters Command.Paramsint object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) Remarks The command expects two integer parameters supplied via the inherited paramsint array. If the parameters are doubles the command throws a BOOSE.CanvasException. On successful validation the command calls canvas.Rect(width, height, false). Constructors AppRect() Parameterless constructor used by the factory and deserializers. public AppRect() AppRect(Canvas, int, int) Initializes a new instance of the AppRect class with a specific canvas and dimensions. public AppRect(Canvas c, int width, int height) Parameters c Canvas Canvas instance on which the rectangle will be drawn. width int Initial width of the rectangle. height int Initial height of the rectangle. Fields height private int height Field Value int width private int width Field Value int Methods Execute() Executes the rect command: Calls base.Execute() to perform any base-class processing. Ensures parameters are integers (throws if IsDouble is true). Reads width and height from the inherited paramsint array. Validates dimensions are at least 1. Calls canvas.Rect(width, height, false) to draw the rectangle. public override void Execute() Exceptions CanvasException Thrown when parameters contain doubles or when width/height are less than 1.

Remarks The form constructs an application-specific AppCommandFactory, a BOOSE.StoredProgram bound to the IAPPCanvas, and a Parser. Parsing and execution errors are displayed in TxtBox_ErrorOutput. Constructors Booze_UI() Initializes a new instance of the Booze_UI form. Sets up UI components and initializes BOOSE subsystems. public Booze_UI() Fields Factory Factory that creates application-specific command instances. private CommandFactory Factory Field Value CommandFactory Parser Parser that converts source BOOSE text into commands using the command factory. private IParser Parser Field Value IParser Program Program storage that accumulates parsed commands and executes them. private StoredProgram Program Field Value StoredProgram TxtBox_CmdList private RichTextBox TxtBox_CmdList Field Value RichTextBox TxtBox_ErrorOutput private RichTextBox TxtBox_ErrorOutput Field Value RichTextBox btn_Run private Button btn_Run Field Value Button btn_reset private Button btn_reset Field Value Button canvas Canvas used for drawing commands. private IAPPCanvas canvas Field Value IAPPCanvas components Required designer variable. private IContainer components Field Value IContainer pctbox_main private PictureBox pctbox_main Field Value PictureBox Methods Booze_UI_Load(object, EventArgs) private void Booze_UI_Load(object sender, EventArgs e) Parameters sender object e EventArgs Dispose(bool) Clean up any resources being used. protected override void Dispose(bool disposing) Parameters disposing bool true if managed resources should be disposed; otherwise, false. Form1_Paint(object, PaintEventArgs) Paint event handler that ensures the current canvas bitmap is displayed in the picture box. private void Form1_Paint(object sender, PaintEventArgs e) Parameters sender object Event source. e PaintEventArgs Paint event arguments. InitializeComponent() Required method for Designer support - do not modify the contents of this method with the code editor. private void InitializeComponent() btn_Run_Click(object, EventArgs) Runs the BOOSE program currently contained in TxtBox_CmdList. Parsing errors (from ParseProgram(string)) , runtime errors (from BOOSE.StoredProgram.Run()) and canvas errors from AppCommandFactory). more generally this looks at any error thrown by boose are caught and appended to TxtBox_ErrorOutput. private void btn_Run_Click(object sender, EventArgs e) Parameters sender object Event source (Run button). e EventArgs Event arguments. Exceptions BOOSEException Thrown by the parser , runtime or canvas; this method catches the exception and displays the message to the user. btn_reset_Click(object, EventArgs) Clears the command input and error output text boxes. private void btn_reset_Click(object sender, EventArgs e) Parameters sender object Event source (Reset button). e EventArgs Event arguments.

docs/Booze_Project.IAPPCanvas.html.title: Class IAPPCanvas | Jays Boose Documentation
docs/Booze_Project.IAPPCanvas.html.summary: Class IAPPCanvas Namespace Booze_Project Assembly Booze Project.dll Application implementation of the BOOSE.ICanvas interface. Provides drawing primitives backed by a Bitmap and a Graphics object. The canvas stores a pen position (Xpos, Ypos) which many commands use as the current drawing origin. public class IAPPCanvas : ICanvas Inheritance object IAPPCanvas Implements ICanvas Inherited Members object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.ToString() Constructors IAPPCanvas(int, int) Initializes a new instance of the IAPPCanvas class with the specified pixel dimensions. public IAPPCanvas(int xSize, int ySize) Parameters xSize int Width of the canvas in pixels. ySize int Height of the canvas in pixels. Fields CanvasBitmap private Bitmap CanvasBitmap Field Value Bitmap g private Graphics g Field Value Graphics pen private Pen pen Field Value Pen xPos private Int xPos Field Value Int yPos private Int yPos Field Value Int Properties PenColour Pen colour accessor (stored as an object to match the BOOSE interface). Note: the current implementation returns/sets the same property and may cause infinite recursion if invoked — consider updating the implementation to wrap the pen colour. public object PenColour { get; set; } Property Value object Xpos Current X coordinate of the pen position on the canvas. public int Xpos { get; set; } Property Value int Ypos Current Y coordinate of the pen position on the canvas. public int Ypos { get; set; } Property Value int Methods Circle(int, bool) Draws a circle centered on the current pen position. public void Circle(int radius, bool filled) Parameters radius int Radius of the circle in pixels. filled bool Whether the circle should be filled. Current implementation ignores this flag. Clear() Clears the canvas by drawing a white rectangle over the full bitmap area. public void Clear() DrawTo(int, int) Draws a line from the current pen position to the supplied coordinates and updates the pen position. public void DrawTo(int x, int y) Parameters x int Destination X coordinate. y int Destination Y coordinate. MoveTo(int, int) Moves the pen position to the specified coordinates without drawing. public void MoveTo(int x, int y) Parameters x int New X coordinate for the pen. y int New Y coordinate for the pen. Rect(int, int, bool) Draws a rectangle with the current pen position as the top-left corner. public void Rect(int width, int height, bool filled) Parameters width int Rectangle width in pixels. height int Rectangle height in pixels. filled bool Whether the rectangle should be filled. Current implementation ignores this flag. Reset() Resets the pen position to the default coordinates (100,100). public void Reset() Set(int, int) Resizes the canvas bitmap preserving existing contents by copying to a temporary bitmap. public void Set(int width, int height) Parameters width int New width in pixels. height int New height in pixels. SetColour(int, int, int) Sets the pen colour using RGB components. public void SetColour(int red, int green, int blue) Parameters red int Red component (0-255). green int Green component (0-255). blue int Blue component (0-255). Tri(int, int) Draws a triangle with the current pen position as the left vertex. public void Tri(int width, int height) Parameters width int Base width of the triangle. height int Height of the triangle. WriteText(string) Draws text at the current pen position using a default Arial 16pt font. public void WriteText(string text) Parameters text string Text to draw. getBitmap() Returns the underlying bitmap used for rendering. The return type is object to match the BOOSE API. public object getBitmap() Returns object The Bitmap currently used by the canvas (boxed as object).

docs/Booze_Project.html.title: Namespace Booze_Project | Jays Boose Documentation
docs/Booze_Project.html.summary: Namespace Booze_Project Classes AppCircle Represents the 'circle' command. Validates a single integer parameter and instructs the canvas to draw a circle of the specified radius. Inherits from BOOSE.CommandOneParameter. AppCommandFactory Application-specific command factory that creates concrete BOOSE.ICommand instances for commands supported by the application and delegates unknown commands to the base BOOSE.CommandFactory. AppMoveTo Application implementation of the BOOSE.CommandTwoParameters for the moveto command. Reads two integer parameters (x, y) from the inherited paramsint array and instructs the associated canvas to move the pen position to that location. AppRect Application implementation of the BOOSE.CommandTwoParameters for the rect command. Validates two integer parameters (width and height) and instructs the canvas to draw a rectangle. ApplicationConfiguration Bootstrap the application configuration. Booze_UI Main Windows Forms UI for the BOOSE application. Hosts the drawing canvas, the command factory, parser and stored program, and exposes event handlers for user interaction (run, reset, paint, etc.). IAPPCanvas Application implementation of the BOOSE.ICanvas interface. Provides drawing primitives backed by a Bitmap and a Graphics object. The canvas stores a pen position (Xpos, Ypos) which many commands use as the current drawing origin. Program
